item.title: About
item.description: I studied Computer Science from 2017 to 2022 at the University of Trento and Milan, and started working as a Software Engineer soon after. More recently, I moved to Berlin. Experience Amazon 07/24 - Now | Berlin Software Development Engineer II Satispay 01/23 - 06/24 | Milan Software Engineer Spaziodati 02/20 - 06/20 | Trento Software Engineer Intern Education University of Milan 2020 - 2022 Master’s degree in computer science
